pages.text: $(li)The Illagers, unlike the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) don't live quietly in a small $(l:patchouli:villagers/villagers)Village$(/l). They live in walled big camps with water wells, crops, bedrooms, stables and even a shooting range.$(br)$(li)Be careful, $(l:patchouli:illagers/archer)Archers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/vindicator)Vindicators$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_general)Generals$(/l) will not hesitate to defend their fort for intruders like you.

$(li)The Illager Fort can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forests$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/badlands)Badlands$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/mushroom/mushroom_fields)Mushroom Fields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savanna$(/l) biomes.
